targets.expr: sum(up{job=~".*$service.*"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left() kube_pod_info{pod=~"$service-.*", namespace="download-clients"}) by (namespace)

sum(increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{pod=~"$service-.*", namespace="download-clients"}[1h]) * on(pod, namespace) group_left() kube_pod_info{pod=~"$service-.*", namespace="download-clients"}) by (namespace)

(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{pod=~"$service-.*", container="$service", namespace="download-clients"}[5m]) / on(pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", pod=~"$service-.*", container="$service", namespace="download-clients"}) * 100 * on(pod, namespace) group_left() kube_pod_info{pod=~"$service-.*", namespace="download-clients"}

(container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod=~"$service-.*", container="$service", namespace="download-clients"} / on(pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", pod=~"$service-.*", container="$service", namespace="download-clients"}) * 100 * on(pod, namespace) group_left() kube_pod_info{pod=~"$service-.*", namespace="download-clients"}

(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{pod=~"$service-.*", container="$service", namespace="download-clients"}[5m]) / on(pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", pod=~"$service-.*", container="$service", namespace="download-clients"}) * 100 * on(pod, namespace) group_left() kube_pod_info{pod=~"$service-.*", namespace="download-clients"}

max((kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", pod=~"$service-.*", container="$service", namespace="download-clients"} / on(pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", pod=~"$service-.*", container="$service", namespace="download-clients"}) * 100) by (namespace, container)

(container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod=~"$service-.*", container="$service", namespace="download-clients"} / on(pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", pod=~"$service-.*", container="$service", namespace="download-clients"}) * 100 * on(pod, namespace) group_left() kube_pod_info{pod=~"$service-.*", namespace="download-clients"}

max((kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", pod=~"$service-.*", container="$service", namespace="download-clients"} / on(pod, container, namespace) kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", pod=~"$service-.*", container="$service", namespace="download-clients"}) * 100) by (namespace, container)
